_meta.cross_source_guardrail: Keep Game8 hero identity fields stable; store Fandom identifiers only in Fandom manifests/quote files.
_meta.app_sync_strategy: Use Supabase for auth and synced lightweight metadata (profiles, barracks, teams, notes, favorites).
_meta.asset_storage_strategy: Do not store heavy local PNG archives in Supabase during free-tier phase; keep URL pointers in metadata and preserve local archive as canonical backup.

name: Hero Name - Title
rarity: 5 or 4/5 (normalized star availability for app display)
discovered_at: ISO timestamp when row was discovered/seeded
ivs: Asset/Flaw recommendation text block from source table
